column4: hello, Ubuntu 11.04 on my laptop is really slow browsing on the internet or even pingining sites like google takes too long (it takes 36791ms to  "ping -c 5 google.com"), i have gentoo installed on vmware in the same laptop and the internet is allright, any ideas?
how long does it take to `nslookup google.com` ?
Or, pick something you haven't tested recently, nslookup yahoo.com
